Class QueryAlgebraUtil

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fluidops.fedx.util.QueryAlgebraUtil

  • public class QueryAlgebraUtil
extends java.lang.Object
    Various static functions for query handling and parsing (alegbra expression).

    Andreas Schwarte

      • selectQuery

        public static org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr selectQuery(org.openrdf.query.algebra.StatementPattern stmt,
                                              org.openrdf.query.BindingSet bindings,
                                              FilterValueExpr filterExpr,
                                              java.lang.Boolean evaluated)
                                                       throws IllegalQueryException
        Construct a SELECT query for the provided statement.
        Parameters:
        stmt -
        bindings -
        filterExpr -
        evaluated - parameter can be used outside this method to check whether FILTER has been evaluated, false in beginning
        Returns:
        Throws:
        IllegalQueryException

      • selectQuery

        public static org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr selectQuery(ExclusiveGroup group,
                                              org.openrdf.query.BindingSet bindings,
                                              FilterValueExpr filterExpr,
                                              java.lang.Boolean evaluated)
        Construct a SELECT query for the provided ExclusiveGroup. Note that bindings and filterExpr are applied whenever possible.
        Parameters:
        group - the expression for the query
        bindings - the bindings to be applied
        filterExpr - a filter expression or null
        evaluated - parameter can be used outside this method to check whether FILTER has been evaluated, false in beginning
        Returns:

      • selectQueryBoundUnion

        public static org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr selectQueryBoundUnion(org.openrdf.query.algebra.StatementPattern stmt,
                                                        java.util.List<org.openrdf.query.BindingSet> unionBindings,
                                                        FilterValueExpr filterExpr,
                                                        java.lang.Boolean evaluated)
        Construct a SELECT query expression for a bound union. Pattern: SELECT ?v_1 ?v_2 ?v_N WHERE { { ?v_1 p o } UNION { ?v_2 p o } UNION ... } Note that the filterExpr is not evaluated at the moment.
        Parameters:
        stmt -
        unionBindings -
        filterExpr -
        evaluated - parameter can be used outside this method to check whether FILTER has been evaluated, false in beginning
        Returns:

      • selectQueryStringBoundCheck

        public static org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr selectQueryStringBoundCheck(org.openrdf.query.algebra.StatementPattern stmt,
                                                              java.util.List<org.openrdf.query.BindingSet> unionBindings)
        Construct a SELECT query for a grouped bound check. Pattern: SELECT DISTINCT ?o_1 .. ?o_N WHERE { { s1 p1 ?o_1 FILTER ?o_1=o1 } UNION ... UNION { sN pN ?o_N FILTER ?o_N=oN }}
        Parameters:
        stmt -
        unionBindings -
        Returns:

      • selectQueryIndependentJoinGroup

        public static org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr selectQueryIndependentJoinGroup(IndependentJoinGroup joinGroup,
                                                                  org.openrdf.query.BindingSet bindings)

      • selectQueryIndependentJoinGroup

        public static org.openrdf.query.algebra.TupleExpr selectQueryIndependentJoinGroup(IndependentJoinGroup joinGroup,
                                                                  java.util.List<org.openrdf.query.BindingSet> bindings)
        Construct a select query representing a bound independent join group. ?v_%stmt%#%bindingId$ SELECT ?v_0_0 ?v_0_1 ?v_1_0 ... WHERE { { ?v_0#0 p o UNION ?v_0_1 p o UNION ... } UNION { ?v_1_0 p o UNION ?v_1_1 p o UNION ... } UNION ... }
        Parameters:
        joinGroup -
        bindings -
        Returns:
